subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Question...

full_text:
Unfortunately, no. Maybe I should make one some time!
:-)

Bob Shannon and I became good friends via e-mail back in the 90's. Then he
kind of disappeared off cyberspace. I haven't tried to track him down lately
so I don't know what happened to him.

Zack
